content: If you want to drop in for 5 minutes, ask a question, get an answer and leave, Discord is fine. If you want to start a month-long discussion about some subtle corner of the language, come to Zulip.

In general, Zulip is for discussion around participation in the Rust project and creating Rust and all officially associated projects (i.e., working on the compiler, tooling, docs, governance, etc.) while Discord is for getting help with using Rust
